snippet: Several technology companies on Wednesday celebrated World IPv6 Day, a moment when many big tech companies and Internet providers began switching to a new standard for getting on the Web. It's not something most of us will ever have to worry about,...
abstract: Several technology companies on Wednesday celebrated World IPv6 Day, a moment when many big tech companies and Internet providers began switching to a new standard for getting on the Web. It's not something most of us will ever have to worry about, but it will make the Internet run more smoothly.

headline.main: Happy IPv6 Day! But What the Heck Is IPv6?
